automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_lights_office_wled_cue'
alias: Living Room Lights Office WLED Cue
description: "Between 9:00 PM and 11:00 PM, when any living room light turns on, briefly turn on Office WLED dim as a cue, then turn it back off."
mode: restart
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id:
      - light.hue_office_back_left
      - light.hue_color_downlight_2_2
      - light.hue_color_downlight_1_7
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '21:00:00'
    before: '23:00:00'
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_living_room_cue
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 20
  - delay: '00:00:10'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_living_room_cue

issues.recommendation: Verify entity scene.office_wled_before_living_room_cue exists in Home Assistant. This entity was not validated during generation - consider using a validated entity instead.

warnings.recommendation: Verify entity scene.office_wled_before_living_room_cue exists in Home Assistant. This entity was not validated during generation - consider using a validated entity instead.
